Source: https://github.com/zai-org/GLM-TTS
Revision: c5dc7aecc3b4032032d631b271e767893984f821

Purpose
- Provide a stable, in-repo snapshot of GLM-TTS inference code so production
  behavior does not depend on `third_party/` updates.

Update policy
- If you need to update the snapshot, do it intentionally and record the source
  revision here.

License
- Upstream is Apache-2.0. Keep `LICENSE` in this folder when redistributing.
